title: Ready for a beautiful apartment home steps away from Pike's Place!
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 556 Sq.
At Sequel, we take Seattle Apartments to the next level.
We emphasize the urge to replicate a good experience by living your life to it's fullest, always having fun and turning your days into timeless adventures.
We are providing a new community that follows through and makes our residents feel fulfilled in the place that they have chosen to call home.

Living at Sequel in the heart of downtown Seattle, you will be a short walk from Pike Place Market, easy access to bus lines and walking distance to local companies including Zillow, Amazon and Porch.
Enjoy all Seattle has to offer at Sequel featuring world class amenities and a location-centric lifestyle.
In the hub of Belltown, business and fun are at your fingertips.
Walk outside to an array of local restaurants featuring Tom Douglas and other happy hour hot spots.
Be sure to ask about our concierge and housekeeping services to supplement your living environment.

Open Layout, Wall Mounted Air Conditioners, Exposed Ceilings, Floor-to-Ceiling Windows, Custom Cabinetry, Energy Star Stainless Steel Appliances, Gas Hot Water, Refrigerator with Water & Ice Dispensers, Chef-style Kitchens, Dishwasher, Wall-to-wall Plank Wood Flooring, Soaking Bathtubs, In-Vanity Lighting, Designer Quartz Countertops, Full Size Washer & Dryer

99 Walk Score, Parcel Delivery Service, Controlled Access Features, 24-hour Fitness Center, Dog Walking Reservations, Discounted SAC Membership, 100 Transit Score, Room Service, 24-hour Rooftop Patio, Personal Training Services, Peloton Bikes, In-Residence Spa Massage, Pet Friendly, Discounted Hotel Services, Dry Cleaning Service, Guest Hotel & Parking Discounts, 24-hour Concierge Service, Housekeeping Service, 24-hour Valet Parking, 24-hour Dog Run, Preferred Rooftop Bar Seating
Sequel is a Pet Friendly Community and located near pet supply shops!

We do not accept Comprehensive Reusable Tenant Screening Reports as defined by and pursuant to RCW 59.18.
